body.p: EAST REID SCHOOL Sunday afternoon callers of Mr and Mrs. Leo King of the Town of Reid were Mr. and Mrs. Ernest Platta of Hatley. Benny and Frank WorzeUa visited Clifford and Herbert Breske Sunday afternoon. Mr. and Mrs. Leo Zoromaki of the- Town of Rrngle ealle^ on Mr. and Mrs. Leo King Saturday evening. The pupils of school w»M have a St. Patrick's program Friday. Mr. and Mrs. Leo Breske visited their daughter Lorraine at Ringie on. Monday. Mr. and Mrs. Barney Ostrowski and family spent Friday evening at the home of Mrs. Katherine Jachovnct. A number of friends and relatives from this district attended the funeral if Mrs. Joe Letarski of the Town of Klderon which was held in Hatley last Monday morning. Mr. and Mrs. Barney Ostrowski and family were callers Sunday afternoon at the Barney Jagier home in Gallon. The condition of Mrs. Sara Trxebiatowskl who underwent a serious operation last Monday is improved. Mrs Frank Letarski spent Sunday with her daughters in Wausau. Simon Trzebiatowski and sons visited Mrs. Trxebiatowski at St Mary’s Hospital in Wausau last week-end.
